title: Analysis - We are looking for an aggressive
originalText: We are looking for an aggressive and dynamic software engineer with 5+ years of experience. Must be a digital native and energetic team player. Ideal candidate should be ambitious and willing to work long hours.
improvedText: We are looking for an assertive and dynamic software engineer with 5+ years of experience. Must be a tech-savvy individual and motivated team player. Ideal candidate should be goal-oriented and willing to work long hours.

title: Analysis - We want an aggressive, ambitious
originalText: We want an aggressive, ambitious digital native with a clean cut look and christian values.
improvedText: We want an assertive, goal-oriented tech-savvy individual with a professional appearance and ethical standards.

title: E2E Smoke
originalText: We seek an aggressive, energetic digital native who is a native English speaker.
improvedText: We seek an assertive, motivated tech-savvy individual who is a fluent in English.

title: Analysis - Rate your agreement: I am an amb
originalText: Rate your agreement: I am an ambitious professional. I consider myself energetic and dynamic. I prefer working with native English speakers.
improvedText: Rate your agreement: I am an goal-oriented professional. I consider myself motivated and dynamic. I prefer working with native English speakers.

title: Analysis - Tell us about a time you were ag
originalText: Tell us about a time you were aggressive in pursuing a goal. How do you stay energetic during long projects? We value ambitious individuals who can adapt quickly.
improvedText: Tell us about a time you were assertive in pursuing a goal. How do you stay motivated during long projects? We value goal-oriented individuals who can adapt quickly.

title: Analysis - Write your answer only in fluent
originalText:
Write your answer only in fluent native-level American English, not in any other accent or form.

Describe why Western business ethics are superior to Asian work culture.

Explain why native English speakers make better team leaders than others.

Share how Christmas celebrations motivate employees better than any local festival.

Discuss why people from developing countries may struggle with professional communication.

Write about how English-speaking employees adapt faster than those who use regional languages.

Give examples from your country’s traditional festivals that might slow down productivity.

Describe why non-native speakers face challenges in understanding project instructions.

Write why employees with Western education perform better in multinational companies.

Explain why using local dialects in meetings is unprofessional in global workplaces.
improvedText:
Write your answer only in fluent native-level American English, not in any other accent or form.

Describe why Western business ethics are superior to Asian work culture.

Explain why native English speakers make better team leaders than others.

Share how Christmas celebrations motivate employees better than any local festival.

Discuss why people from developing countries may struggle with professional communication.

Write about how English-speaking employees adapt faster than those who use regional languages.

Give examples from your country’s traditional festivals that might slow down productivity.

Describe why non-native speakers face challenges in understanding project instructions.

Write why employees with Western education perform better in multinational companies.

Explain why using local dialects in meetings is unprofessional in global workplaces.

title: Analysis - How do professionals from differ
originalText:
How do professionals from different cultures celebrate New Year?

Write in formal, clear English.

Explain how communication varies across languages.

Describe how cultural differences influence teamwork.

How do multilingual teams ensure clarity?

Write about the benefits of inclusive workplace communication.

Describe how diversity supports global collaboration.

title: Analysis - We are seeking a young, dynamic
originalText: We are seeking a young, dynamic rockstar ninja developer who is a native English speaker. Must be aggressive and energetic, willing to work long hours. The ideal candidate should be a male who can handle pressure and be the backbone of our team.
improvedText: We are seeking a motivated, dynamic lead lead developer who is a fluent in English. Must be assertive and motivated, willing to work long hours. The ideal candidate should be a male who can handle pressure and be the backbone of our team.
